EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Approval Web Project v2
EmailTemplate.subject: APPROVAL REQUESTED: Your VinSolutions Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Approval_Contact__c},
Congratulations on your new website!
We at VinSolutions appreciate your business and look forward to making this a success. We understand that your website will be representing your dealership and will not launch your website until we receive your approval to do so.
To ensure a successful launch, we ask that you click on the below link to verify that you and your dealership are ready to begin using your site.
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=2kmjank7ob270&q1={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Id}&q2={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.AccountId__c}&q3={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Approval_ContactId__c}&q4={!SFDC_520_Quote__c.OwnerId__c}
Thank you!
